results.name: Squarefree kernel of prime(n) + 1.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: (PARI) a(n)=my(f=factor(prime(n)+1)[,1]); prod(i=1,#f,f[i]) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Aug 21 2013
